### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)

  - (6.5, 13.5) facing LEFT
  - (10.5, 13.5) facing RIGHT
- Transport belt system connecting components

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with electric pole placement
- When placing electric poles near transport belts, increase the spacing or change direction to avoid conflicts
- Ensure proper spacing between electric poles to maintain power network connectivity

### Entity placement errors
- Check inventory for required items before attempting to place entities
- Verify that the target position is clear before placing new entities

### Power connectivity issues
- Ensure all machines requiring electricity are properly connected to the power network
- Verify that power generation (steam engine, boiler) is operational and fueled

### Production line issues
- Keep burner inserters and mining drills fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Ensure proper orientation of inserters to maintain material flow
- Verify that all required ingredients are available in input chests for assembling machines
